channel.title: Data Centers on Off The Clock Maven
channel.description: Recent content in Data Centers on Off The Clock Maven

item.title: Data Centers: The New Digital Real Estate and Your Guide to the AI Gold Rush
item.description: An in-depth analysis of data center REITs as a prime investment for the AI era. This report compares industry giants Digital Realty (DLR) and Equinix (EQIX), examining the market supercycle driven by hyperscaler CAPEX, technological shifts to liquid cooling, and the critical role of power infrastructure.

item.title: The AI Energy Crisis: A Deep Dive into the Trillion-Dollar Power Problem
item.description: A comprehensive analysis of the AI-induced energy crisis, exploring the market cycle, key corporate players in cooling and power, their financial health, and the long-term solutions like SMRs.
